name: Mind Game: Magi
description:
Magi: Mind Game is like Rock Paper Scissors except it requires more brain power and skill to win. There are 5 moves not 3, and have nuance based on the current situation.

Feedback welcome!

How to Play:

Login, guest user is fine. Or register an account and login (email optional). You can register your guest account after playing with it if you want too.

Click one of the start match options on the top right.

Once in game just click a spell before the timer runs out for that round.

You can unlock "verbal techniques" that allow you to communicate or mess with your opponents during the match.

Features a ranked and MMR based match making system, try to rank up to unlock exclusive "verbal techniques"!

 

Spells are below you can read their description in game during and after a match:

Fireball: 

Charge and release a giant fireball over two turns.

Damage: 25 Countered by: Reflecting Wind (During Release)

 

Earth Spike:

Launch stalagmite at opponent.

Damage: 10 Counters: Lightning Stun Countered by: Reflecting Wind

 

Lightning Stun:

Strike your opponent with lightning stunning them for 1 turn so they can't cast anything.

Counters: Reflecting Wind Countered by: Earth Spike, Water Blast

 

Reflecting Wind: 

Create a gust of wind that reflects projectiles (Fireball and Earth spike) back to your opponent.

Counters: Fireball, Earth Spike Countered by: Lightning Stun, Water Blast

 

Water Blast:  

Summon a gushing water blast that attacks the enemy. Does low damage but cannot be reflected and absorbs lightning.

Damage: 6 Damage Counters: Reflecting Wind, Lightning Stun
